data.description: Perl interface to Zemanta Suggest service
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
To my knowledge Net::Zemanta is the first module on CPAN to provide
    Perl bindings to functions provided by Zemanta API.

    The namespace and interface style were designed to be similar to
    already existing bindings to other APIs, like Akismet and Flickr.
